ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in https://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/CodeSystem/emcare-custom-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
EmCare.B20S2.DE03Skin Pinch goes back very slowly (More than 2 seconds)The client's skin goes back very slowly after Skin pinch of Abdomen (More than 2 seconds)
EmCare.B20S2.DE04Skin Pinch goes back slowly (2 seconds or fewer, but not immediately)The client's skin goes back slowly after Skin pinch of Abdomen (2 seconds or fewer, but not immediately)
EmCare.B20S2.DE05Skin Pinch goes back Normally (immediately)The client's skin goes back normally after Skin pinch of Abdomen (immediately)

display.value: Skin Pinch goes back very slowly (More than 2 seconds)

value.value: The client's skin goes back very slowly after Skin pinch of Abdomen (More than 2 seconds)

display.value: Skin Pinch goes back slowly (2 seconds or fewer, but not immediately)

value.value: The client's skin goes back slowly after Skin pinch of Abdomen (2 seconds or fewer, but not immediately)
The client's skin goes back normally after Skin pinch of Abdomen (immediately)
